header.title: Wir haben Neuigkeiten!
header.strapline: Die Bibel in einem Jahr ist nach Bible.Alpha.org umgezogen. Derselbe tolle Inhalt, neues Zuhause. Bitte warten Sie, bis Sie weitergeleitet werden.

img.desc: Eine Frau schaut vom Smartphone auf, auf dem sie Bibel in Einem Jahr liest.

header.title: हमें खबर मिली है!
header.strapline: एक साल में बाइबल Bible.Alpha.org हो गई है। वही महान सामग्री, नया घर। कृपया पुनर्निर्देशित होने की प्रतीक्षा करें.

img.desc: A man looks down at his phone, while listening to Bible in One Year

en.intro: Form a daily habit of reading Scripture

about.outro: Nicky & Pippa lead Holy Trinity Brompton (HTB), a church in central London. They first introduced the Bible in One Year commentary in 2011 as a daily email for their congregation members. Since then it has grown beyond that daily email to be a website, app, podcast, and more with a worldwide following.
about.quote: Join us as we read the Bible each day. It’s a practice that we have been doing for over 30 years and we hope it will benefit your life as much as it has ours.
about.intro: Bible in One Year is a practice that Nicky & Pippa Gumbel have been doing for over thirty years. Join them each day as they take you into every chapter and every verse in the Bible and let the Holy Spirit speak into your life.
about.header: Let Nicky and Pippa Be Your Guide

header.title: We've got news!
header.strapline: Bible in One Year has had a small makeover and is now called The Bible with Nicky and Pippa Gumbel. You will be automatically redirected to our new home at bible.alpha.org

img.desc: A woman looks up from reading Bible In One Year on her phone.

editions.intro: Bible in One Year comes in three editions, and is being translated into many languages ...

header.title: Abbiamo delle novità!
header.strapline: La Bibbia in un anno si è trasferita in Bible.Alpha.org. Stessi grandi contenuti, nuova casa. Attendi di essere reindirizzato.

img.desc: Una donna alza lo sguardo dopo aver letto la Bibbia in un anno sul suo telefono.

editions.intro: Bible in One Year comes in three editions, and is being translated into many languages ...

header.title: Nous avons des nouvelles !
header.strapline: La Bible en un an a déménagé à Bible.Alpha.org. Même contenu de qualité, nouvelle maison. Veuillez patienter jusqu’à ce que vous soyez redirigé.

img.desc: Une femme lit la Bible en 1 an sur son téléphone.

header.title: ¡Tenemos noticias!
header.strapline: La Biblia en un Año, ha tenido una pequeña actualización de imagen y ahora se llama La Biblia con Nicky y Pippa Gumbel.  Serás redirigido automaticamente a nuestro nuevo sitio web en  bible.alpha.org

img.desc: Un hombre mira su teléfono mientras escucha La Biblia en Un Año

header.title: 我们有消息了！
header.strapline: 一年圣经已经搬到了 Bible.Alpha.org。同样伟大的内容，新家。请等待重定向。

img.desc: A man looks down at his phone, while listening to Bible in One Year

header.title: !لدينا أخبار
header.strapline: انتقل الكتاب المقدس في سنة واحدة إلى Bible.Alpha.org. نفس المحتوى الرائع ، منزل جديد. يرجى الانتظار حتى تتم إعادة توجيهك.

img.desc: A man looks up from reading Bible In One Year on his phone.

header.title: Chúng tôi có tin tức!
header.strapline: Kinh Thánh trong Một Năm đã chuyển sang Bible.Alpha.org. Cùng một nội dung tuyệt vời, ngôi nhà mới. Vui lòng chờ để được chuyển hướng.

img.desc: Một người phụ nữ đang đọc Kinh Thánh Trong Một Năm trên điện thoại của cô ấy nhìn lên.

editions.intro: Bible in One Year comes in three editions, and is being translated into many languages ...

header.title: เรามีข่าว!
header.strapline: คัมภีร์ไบเบิลในหนึ่งปีได้ย้ายไปที่ Bible.Alpha.org เนื้อหาที่ดีเหมือนกันบ้านใหม่ โปรดรอสักครู่เพื่อเปลี่ยนเส้นทาง

header.title: Kami punya berita!
header.strapline: Bible in One Year telah pindah ke Bible.Alpha.org. Konten hebat yang sama, rumah baru. Silakan tunggu untuk dialihkan.
